con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/v1" name="HandiService" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:mes="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/messages/v1" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/v1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Handi service WDSL v1.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:import namespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/messages/v1" schemaLocation="messages/handiServiceMessages_v1.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getHandiRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="GetHandiRequest" element="mes:getHandiRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getHandiResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="GetHandiResponse" element="mes:getHandiResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="HandiServicePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="getHandiFile"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getHandiRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getHandiResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="HandiServiceHTTPBinding" type="tns:HandiServicePortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getHandiFile"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://fidus.brussels/services/handiservice/getHandiFile"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="HandiService_v1"> <wsdl:port name="HandiService_v1" binding="tns:HandiServiceHTTPBinding"> <soap:address location="http://fidus.brussels/services/handiservice/v1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/messages/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cme="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1" xmlns:exc="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/service/handiservice/messages/v1" xmlns:han="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/Handi/v1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1" schemaLocation="baseMessageTypes_v1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1" schemaLocation="exceptionTypes_v1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/Handi/v1" schemaLocation="../handi/HandiTypesV1.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="HandiRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The person whose information is requested.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="personNumber" type="cme:PersonNumberType" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The basic identifier of a person is his personNumber.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="informationAtReferenceDate" type="han:InformationAtReferenceDateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="paymentsAtPeriod" type="han:PeriodType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Request getHandiService definition--> <xsd:complexType name="GetHandiRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:RequestMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="cme:LegalContextType"/> <xsd:element name="request" type="tns:HandiRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Request getHandiService definition--> <xsd:complexType name="GetHandiResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageContext" type="cme:ResponseMessageContextType"/> <xsd:element name="responses" type="tns:ResponsesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Technical errors that occur when processing the message context e.g. insufficient rights.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponsesType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="tns:ResponseType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="file" type="han:FileType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptions" type="exc:ExceptionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Business exceptions that occur when processing the request or response e.g. missing data for a single response element. Exceptions at this level may contain back-end specific codes and content.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Element of the request and the response--> <xsd:element name="getHandiRequest" type="tns:GetHandiRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="getHandiResponse" type="tns:GetHandiResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cmn="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/v1" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/messages/v1"> <!--Unformatted message Id--> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--National Number of the person. Format depending on the Register--> <xsd:simpleType name="PersonNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([0][0-9])|([1][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))(([0-9]{2}[1-9])|([0-9][1-9][0-9])|([1-9][0-9]{2}))(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>National Register format</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:pattern> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([2][0-9])|([3][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CBSS Register format: Bis Register</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:pattern> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([4][0-9])|([5][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CBSS Register format: Ter Register</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:pattern> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Request message context--> <xsd:complexType name="RequestMessageContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message context block generated by the consumer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageId" type="tns:MessageIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Consumer must assign their own MessageId reference for the request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timestamp when client sent request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Response message context--> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseMessageContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>MessageContext block generated by Fidus.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageId" type="tns:MessageIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique identifier generated by Fidus.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transactionId" type="tns:MessageIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique ID returned to the client for tracing purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Time reply was sent by Fidus.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Legal Context : the finality of the Privacy Commission--> <xsd:simpleType name="LegalContextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="UserContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The user context defines information regarding the actual user performing a request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="language" type="xsd:language" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The preferred language of the actual user performing the request. This influences the language in which response elements are cast.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://fidus.brussels/type/common/exceptions/v1"> <!--Basic error typed--> <xsd:complexType name="ExceptionsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exception" type="tns:ExceptionType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExceptionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:ExceptionClassType"/> <xsd:element name="code" type="tns:ExceptionCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="source" type="tns:ExceptionSourceType"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="tns:ExceptionDescriptionType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionClassType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WARNING"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INFO"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionSourceType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExceptionDescriptionType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2008 rel. 2 sp2 (http://www.altova.com) by USER (KSZ-BCSS)--> <!--===================================================================== * File Name : HandiTypesV1.xsd * Author : Alain Tilmant & Catherine Cocu (BCSS)
* Owner : * Domain : * Creation date : 07/10/2014 * Last revision date : * Description : support WS Handi (DB Tetra de la DGPH * Status : Model * Current Version : 1.1 * Revision History * 07/10/2013 : adapter les informations pour un service a destination de plusieurs clients (CPAS, MRBC, VAPH, DG06, Studie Toelagen) * 08/10/2013 : ajout d'une operation et definition des premiers legal context * 14/10/2014 : ajout de tous les legal context connus a ce jour * 21/10/2013 : ajout des schemas de la DGPH pour reprendre ses types particuliers d'adresse (DGPH/BaseLegalDataV1.xsd + DGPH/common) * 28/10/2013 : suite aux premiers tests - decouvertes des adaptations unilaterales du schéma DGPH right : inversion totalMonthAmount & monthAmount recognition : choice entre child and aldult recognitionChild : unsuitability optional * 06/12/2013 : chgt nom handicapRecognition par handicapRecognitionDetails * 11/12/2013 : ajouter le ssin dans la reponse * 13/12/2013 : mettre deux occurences pour bloc socialCards * 20/12/2013 : noDataReasonType * 05/02/2014 : CategoryIVT add '-' = ne s'applique pas * 12/05/2014 : correction legalContext + taille building 48 vs 24 * 26/05/2014 : ajout des legal context de nouveaux clients * 02/09/2014 : ajout des legal context de nouveaux clients * 21/10/2014 : maj des legal context (27 a 31)--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/Handi/v1" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="2014-10-21" xmlns:tns="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/Handi/v1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/common/v3.0" xmlns:dgph="http://dgph.fgov.be/types/baselegaldata"> <xsd:import namespace="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/common/v3.0" schemaLocation="CommonV3.xsd"/> <!--<xsd:import namespace="http://kszbcss.fgov.be/types/legaldata/v3" schemaLocation="BaseLegalDataV3.xsd"/>--> <xsd:import namespace="http://dgph.fgov.be/types/baselegaldata" schemaLocation="DGPH/DGPHBaseLegalDataV1.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="AbstractRequestCustomerType" abstract="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Base complex type for all request messages.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="informationCustomer" type="common:InformationCustomerType"/> <xsd:element name="informationCBSS" type="common:InformationCBSSType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="tns:HandiLegalContext"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AbstractResponseCustomerType" abstract="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Base complex type for all response messages.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="informationCustomer" type="common:InformationCustomerType"/> <xsd:element name="informationCBSS" type="common:InformationCBSSType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="tns:HandiLegalContext"/> <!--<xsd:element name="status" type="common:StatusType"/>--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsultFileRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:AbstractRequestCustomerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="wantedInformation" type="tns:WantedInformationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsultFileResponseType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:AbstractResponseCustomerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="wantedInformation" type="tns:WantedInformationType"/> <xsd:element name="status" type="common:StatusType"/> <xsd:element name="file" type="tns:FileType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsultRightsAndPaymentsRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:AbstractRequestCustomerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="criteria" type="tns:CriteriaRightsAndPaymentsType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsultRightsAndPaymentsResponseType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:AbstractResponseCustomerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="criteria" type="tns:CriteriaRightsAndPaymentsType"/> <xsd:element name="status" type="common:StatusType"/> <xsd:element name="file" type="tns:FileType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="100"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EvolutionOfRequestType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="legislation" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="requestDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="administrativePendingRequest" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="handicapRecognitionPending" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="fileCompletionDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="appeal" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FileType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ssin" type="common:SsinType"/> <xsd:element name="addressHandicappedPerson" type="tns:PersonDataType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="evolutionOfRequest" type="tns:EvolutionOfRequestType"/> <!--from 5--> <xsd:element name="handicapRecognition" type="tns:HandicapType"/> <!--from 5--> <xsd:element name="rights" type="tns:RightsType"/> <!--from 100--> <xsd:element name="socialCards" type="tns:SocialCardsType" maxOccurs="2"/> <!--from 24--> <xsd:element name="payments" type="tns:PaymentsType" maxOccurs="24"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="HandicapRecognitionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lowerLimbs50p" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="fullBlindness" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="upperLimbsAmputated" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="upperLimbsParalyzed" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="HandicapType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="dateOfDecision" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="startDateRecognition" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="endDateRecognition" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="handicapRecognitionDetails" type="tns:HandicapRecognitionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="resultRecognitionChild" type="tns:ResultRecognitionChildType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="resultRecognitionAdult" type="tns:ResultRecognitionAdultType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <!--<xsd:element name="administrativeStatus" type="xsd:int"/>--> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentsType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="yearMonth" type="xsd:gYearMonth" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="amount" type="tns:MoneyAmountType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cancelledPayment" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PillarsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="pillar1" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="pillar2" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="pillar3" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="pillarsTotal" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="36"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResultRecognitionAdultType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="diminuationIndependence" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="mobility" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="nourishment" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="hygiene" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="household" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="supervision" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="socialSkills" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="totalPoints" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="diminuationEarnings" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="unsuitability" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="mentalUnsuitability" type="tns:Percentage" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="physicalUnsuitability" type="tns:Percentage" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResultRecognitionChildType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="inabilityFollowCourse" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inabilityToWork" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="disabilityCode" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="independencyScore" type="tns:Int0_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="pillars" type="tns:PillarsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="childPathology" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RightsType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="period" type="common:OpenPeriodType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="legislation" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="3"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="totalMonthAmount" type="tns:MoneyAmountType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="monthAmount" type="tns:MoneyAmountType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="categoryIVT" type="tns:CategoryUVTType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="categoryIT" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="5"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="partnerIncome" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SocialCardsType"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="noDataReason" type="tns:NoDataReasonType"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="deliveryDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="endDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cardNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{10}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="cardType" type="tns:CardTypeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="WantedInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ssin" type="common:SsinType"/> <xsd:element name="informationAtReferenceDate" type="tns:InformationAtReferenceDateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="paymentsAtPeriod" type="tns:PeriodType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CardTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="PARKINGCARD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REDUCTIONCARD"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CategoryUVTType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="A"/> <xsd:enumeration value="B"/> <xsd:enumeration value="C"/> <xsd:enumeration value="-"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Int0_3Type"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Percentage"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A percentage number (from 0 to 100)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="100"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MoneyAmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An amount of money (max 999999999.99, with 2 decimals)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="PersonDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lastName" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="48"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <!--Sometimes, people has no first name--> <xsd:element name="firstName" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="24"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="address" type="dgph:AddressType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InformationAtReferenceDateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="referenceDate" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>date de reference pour l'ensemble des informations demandées</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="evolutionOfRequest" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="handicapRecognition" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="rights" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="socialCards" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!----> <xsd:simpleType name="NoDataReasonType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="no data in db"/> <xsd:enumeration value="not requested"/> <xsd:enumeration value="not authorized"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="CriteriaRightsAndPaymentsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ssin" type="common:SsinType"/> <xsd:element name="period" type="common:PeriodType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!----> <xsd:complexType name="PeriodType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="startDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="endDate" type="xsd:date"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--21/10/2014--> <xsd:simpleType name="HandiLegalContext"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="?"/> <xsd:enumeration value="accompaniment of unemployed"/> <xsd:enumeration value="assistance to individuals"/> <xsd:enumeration value="calculation of the contribution for subsidies"/> <xsd:enumeration value="calculation name="cityCode" type="tns:CityCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="cityName" type="dgph_common:DescriptionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="3"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="NameType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="NationalityCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="businessAnomalies" type="tns:BusinessAnomaliesType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:group> <xsd:complexType name="BusinessAnomaliesType"> <xsd:annotation> business Faults</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique code referring to a description of this Fault</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="severity" type="tns:SeverityType"/> <xsd:element name="description"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Some description of this Fault</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="information" type="tns:InformationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="15"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CBSSFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="informationCustomer" type="tns:InformationCustomerType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="informationCBSS" type="tns:InformationCBSSType"/> <xsd:element name="detail" type="tns:MessageType" maxOccurs="30"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="severity" type="tns:SeverityType"/> <xsd:element name="reasonCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="16"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="diagnostic"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="authorCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="information" type="tns:InformationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="15"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fieldName"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="64"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fieldValue" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Base types for most common request/response format for consultation type operations. Can be used to define request and response types with extension type inheritance. Don't use if it doesn't fit the requirements.--> <xsd:complexType name="BaseRequestType" abstract="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type defining the base structure for all service requests</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="informationCustomer" type="tns:InformationCustomerType"/> <xsd:element name="informationCBSS" type="tns:InformationCBSSType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="tns:LegalContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>legal context under which the request was made</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BaseResponseType" abstract="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type defining the base structure for all service responses</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="informationCustomer" type="tns:InformationCustomerType"/> <xsd:element name="informationCBSS" type="tns:InformationCBSSType"/> <xsd:element name="legalContext" type="tns:LegalContextType"/> <xsd:element name="status" type="tns:StatusType"/> <xsd:element name="businessAnomalies" type="tns:BusinessAnomaliesType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Commonly used status type for consultation type operations. Define another if it doesn't fit requirements.--> <xsd:complexType name="StatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="value"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>global status of the result</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="DATA_FOUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NO_DATA_FOUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NO_RESULT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code of the status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="16"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="description" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the description of the status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="information" type="tns:InformationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="15"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
